name: English
indexing_message: This process might require a long time. Continue?
setting_initInfo: The Asset Lens plugin is disabled. When the plugin is enabled on first, Asset Lens generate cache data to recognize asset dependencies and it might take few times based on size of the project.
dialog_noIndexedData: There is no indexed data. Generate?
dialog_indexedAssetExpired: indexed caches are expired. generate again?
inspector_editorUtilityMissingObjectHelp:
Missing object cannot be tracked in EditorUtility dependency mode.
Turn off EditorUtilityOnSearch option in ProjectSetting/Asset Lens
remove_messageContent:
This asset is used by other asset. 
Will you delete this asset?
IndexByGuidRegExTooltip: When this option is disabled, EditorUtility of Unity will be used instead RegEx.
IndexSceneObjectTooltip: When a scene of huge scale exists, indexing takes more time a little bit.
IndexPackageSubDirTooltip: Includes every directories under Packages/ and Library/PackageCache/.
IndexWizard_EntranceTooltip: Is this your first time using AssetLens? Press the button to check the quick start guide.
IndexWizard_OpenWhenProjectStartup: Always open when you start a project.
